mapper.insert: insert into article(articleid , title , bannerid , image , istop , isflv , contents , addtime , hits ) values(#{articleid} , #{title} , #{bannerid} , #{image} , #{istop} , #{isflv} , #{contents} , #{addtime} , #{hits} )
mapper.update: update article set title=#{title} , bannerid=#{bannerid} , image=#{image} , istop=#{istop} , isflv=#{isflv} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} , hits=#{hits} where articleid=#{articleid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.bannername from article a , banner b where a.bannerid = b.bannerid order by articleid asc
select a.* , b.bannername from article a , banner b where a.bannerid = b.bannerid and isflv = '是' order by articleid desc limit 5
select a.* , b.bannername from article a , banner b where a.bannerid = b.bannerid and istop = '是' order by articleid desc limit 5
select a.* , b.bannername from article a , banner b where a.bannerid = b.bannerid and a.bannerid = #{bannerid} order by articleid desc limit 7

select a.* , b.bannername from article a , banner b where a.bannerid = b.bannerid
and a.title like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{title}, '%'))
and b.bannername like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{bannerid}, '%'))
and a.image like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{image}, '%'))
and a.istop like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{istop}, '%'))
and a.isflv like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{isflv}, '%'))
and a.contents like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contents}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
and a.hits like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{hits}, '%'))
